Weather: Cold front bringing heavy rain, strong winds and thunderstorms to North Island https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-cold-front-bringing-heavy-rain-strong-winds-and-thunderstorms-to-north-island/S4ZMZL2CYFGJHL5VGVNLFFDSFY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-cold-front-bringing-heavy-rain-strong-winds-and-thunderstorms-to-north-island/S4ZMZL2CYFGJHL5VGVNLFFDSFY/ 'Many locations' in the North Island are in for a chance of thunderstorms this evening. Tue, 29 Oct 2024 06:08:44 +0000 Heavy downpours, strong winds and possibly hail is forecast to accompany thunderstorms in the North Island tonight. Photo / Sylvie Whinray
Truck driver saves woman falling from Auckland Southern Motorway bridge https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/truck-driver-saves-woman-falling-from-auckland-southern-motorway-bridge/TAAUIKJWWRCCZG74OJO42LAS5E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/truck-driver-saves-woman-falling-from-auckland-southern-motorway-bridge/TAAUIKJWWRCCZG74OJO42LAS5E/ David WilliamsThe incident closed the Southern Motorway, with thousands of rush hour motorists stranded. Tue, 29 Oct 2024 06:02:40 +0000 Quick thinking by an Auckland truck driver saved the life of a woman who fell from a Southern Motorway over bridge, causing a mass motorway closure which left thousands of motorists stranded in gridlock traffic.
Yanfei Bao case: Jury sees video appearing to show murder-accused Tingjun Cao buying spade https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/yanfei-bao-jury-sees-video-appearing-to-show-murder-accused-tingjun-cao-buying-spade/DZDGJRTW3BFLTEVGPFCITEAWNQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/yanfei-bao-jury-sees-video-appearing-to-show-murder-accused-tingjun-cao-buying-spade/DZDGJRTW3BFLTEVGPFCITEAWNQ/ The man made a digging motion and appeared to have stains on his clothing. Tue, 29 Oct 2024 05:21:45 +0000 Video footage showed to the jury appears to show murder-accused Tingjun Cao buying a spade on the day Christchurch real estate agent Yanfei Bao disappeared.

Association of Salaried Medical Specialists: Union doubts impact of fast-tracking registration pathway for overseas medical graduates https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/association-of-salaried-medical-specialists-union-doubts-impact-of-fast-tracking-registration-pathway-for-overseas-medical-graduates/ UTGAFGBK7NG4HMFLBSS7UCKXQM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/association-of-salaried-medical-specialists-union-doubts-impact-of-fast-tracking-registration-pathway-for-overseas-medical-graduates/ UTGAFGBK7NG4HMFLBSS7UCKXQM/ Adam PearseThe move comes amid widespread concerns about New Zealand's health workforce. Tue, 29 Oct 2024 05:08:35 +0000 Health Minister Dr Shane Reti claimed the change would help fill gaps in the health workforce. Photo / Sylvie Whinray
Jimmy Heremaia and Ropine Paul named as men charged in connection with Ariki Rigby’s death https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/jimmy-heremaia-and-ropine-paul-named-as-men-charged-in-connection-with-ariki-rigbys-death/J7HLQ6CUSVA55GMPSFTEFQGO2E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/jimmy-heremaia-and-ropine-paul-named-as-men-charged-in-connection-with-ariki-rigbys-death/J7HLQ6CUSVA55GMPSFTEFQGO2E/ Ric StevensJimmy Heremaia is being held at his own request in the segregation unit of a prison. Tue, 29 Oct 2024 05:05:51 +0000 Jimmy Heremaia is accused of murdering Hawke's Bay teen Ariki Rigby in September 2022.
Colombian migrant Juan Galicia Romero jailed for importing drugs into New Zealand https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/colombian-migrant-juan-galicia-romero-jailed-for-importing-drugs-into-new-zealand/EKAELI6ANNG2RHJNEUIO46QBHQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/colombian-migrant-juan-galicia-romero-jailed-for-importing-drugs-into-new-zealand/EKAELI6ANNG2RHJNEUIO46QBHQ/ Catherine HuttonThe Colombian national has been jailed and now faces the possibility of deportation. Tue, 29 Oct 2024 05:00:00 +0000 Meth seized in the police operation was concealed in a picture of the Virgin Mary. Photo / NZ Police
Waikato wetland fire released up to $9.6m worth of carbon into atmosphere https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/waikato-wetland-fire-released-up-to-96m-worth-of-carbon-into-atmosphere/OUVCZBOCJ5ETRGTZRKIK53OSZ4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/waikato-wetland-fire-released-up-to-96m-worth-of-carbon-into-atmosphere/OUVCZBOCJ5ETRGTZRKIK53OSZ4/ Maryana GarciaThe fire, which burnt through 1039ha over five days, has now been fully contained. Tue, 29 Oct 2024 04:42:44 +0000 Tonnes of greenhouse gasses released into the atmosphere by the Waikato wetland fire are estimated to be worth up to $9.6 million.
